DOC.brief_summary: Background : Study design determine effect zero ( ZEEP ) 5 mmHg positive end expiratory pressure ( 5PEEP ) serebral oxymeter level morbid obese patient whose undergoing laporoscopic sleewe gastrectomy . Second outcome investigate effect IAP change cerebral oxygen value LSG . Method:18-65 yo , ASA2-3 status , 60 MO patient plan SLG general anesthesia included.Two patient Group 5 PEEP exclude haemodynamic instability procedure . Patients divide 2 group ventilate PEEP ( Group ZEEP ) ( n=30 ) 5 cmH2O PEEP level ( Group5 PEEP ) ( n=28 ) . All patient use right hand dominant . Near infrared spectroscopy probe apply frontal cerebral area patiens measure rSO2 value . IAP measure transvesically group . Datas record basal , induction anesthesia , 5 minute insuflation ( 5BI ) , 5 minute insuflation ( 5BA ) , 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 minute induction , 5 minute desuflation ( 5BD ) 5 minute desuflation ( 5AD ) time period . Invasive arterial pressure , serebral oxymeter value , 5 lead electrocardiography , peripheral oxygen saturation , end tidal carbondioxide , peak inspiratory pressure , IAP , record time period group . Arterial blood sample analyse 5BI,5AI , 5AD period .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect PEEP Intraabdominal Pressure Levels Cerebral Oxygenation Morbidly Obese .
DOC.detailed_description: 60 morbidly obese patient plan sleewe gastrectomy procedures general anestesia ( ASA 2-3 status ) include study . Patients devided 2 group ventileted positive end expiratory pressure ( Group 5PEEP n=30 ) , 5 cmH2O positive expiratory pressure ( Group ZEEP n=30 ) . All patient right hand dominate.Two patient Group 5 PEEP exclude haemodynamic instability procedure . Exclusion criterias : Documented coronary periferally arteryel disease , unregulated diabetes mellitus , history smoking , symptom bowel urinary bladder obstruction , preoperative systolic pressure grater 170 mmHg , diastolic arterial pressure grater 90mmHg , pregnancy , anemia ( haematocrit level % 30 ) , symptom increase intracranial pressure , significant stenosis carotid artery . In anesthetised patient monitorised 3 lead electrocardiography ( ECG ) , pulse oxymetry ( sPO2 ) , invasive blood pressure ( IBP ) , end-tidal carbondioxide ( EtCO2 ) , intraabdominal pressure level ( IAP ) intravesical urinary catheter , peak inspiratuar pressure ( PIP ) , laparoscopic pressure ( LP ) , regional cerebral oxygen saturation ( rSO2 ) continuously . rSO2 value measure near infrared spectroscopy ( NIRS ) technique cerebral oxymeter ( INVOS 4100 , Somanetics , Covidien ) measurement record basal value ; induction ; 15 minute insuflation ; 15 minute insuflation ; 30 , 45 , 60 induction ; 15 minute desuflation ; 15 minute desuflation . Arterial blood sample collect perform 15 minute insuflation ; 15 minute insuflation ; 15 minute desuflation . Parcial oxygen pressure ( PaO2 ) , parcial carbondioxide pressure ( PaCO2 ) , peripheric oxygen saturation ( SaO2 ) , bicarbonate ( HCO3 ) , aside- base status ( pH ) , haematocrit ( Htc ) haemoglobine ( Hb ) level record evaluate three time period explain . Cerebral oxymeter place skin patient forehead clean special skin-prep pad . The skin sensor apply right left side forehead . The medial margin sensor midline forehead loleri margin 2 cm eyebrow . After induction anesthesia 20 gauge intraarterial cannula place leave radial artery record 5 minute period . Anesthetic procedure measure parameter administer way except PEEP level . All patient receive midazolam 2mg intravenously ( IV ) five minute induction . Anesthesia induce fentanyl ( 1-3 mcgr/kg ) , propofol ( 2-3mg/kg ) , rocuronium ( 0,6 mg/kg ) . After intubation anesthesia maintain sevoflorane 2-3 % volume ( improve MAC 1 level sevoflorane ) . Remifentanyl give continuously surgery rate 0.05-2 mcg/kg/min ) ( IV ) . Rocuronium administer rate 30 min time interval anesthesia . Sugammadex administer end surgery reverse neuromuscular blockage . Tramadol 1mg/kg , 40 mg meperidine paracetamol 1g administer postoperative analgesia trochars remove . The concentration volatile anesthetic monitor GE anesthesia machine . Patients ventilate 6 lt/dk gas flow ( 50 % oxygen 50 % air mixture ) . 6-8 ml/kg tidal volume , inspiration/ expiration rate 1/2 maintain . Respiratory rate 8-12 breath . EtCO2 keep within range 35-45 mmHg . 5mmHg PEEP administer Group 5 PEEP , PEEP administer Group ZEEP . Fluid balance blood replacement maintain % 0.09 NaCl ringer colloid ( Voluven Fresenius Kabi , Graz , Austria ) solution IV . Body temperature maintain normothermic upper body force air warm pad . Laparoscopic pressure maintain 14mmHg throughout operation . Intraabdominal pressure measure mililitres mercury Foley bladder catheter 3 stopcock connect infusion set pressure transducer . IT connect electronic monitor anesthesia machine . ( Datex -Ohmeda S/5 Compact , GE Healthcare , Finland ) . After clemping tube 100 ml Saline solution inject bladder . The transducer replace zeroed urinary bladder level whenever position change throughout procedure . Oscillation test perform start IAP measurement . This measurement perform two position : basal , induction , insuflation , insuflation , desuflation , desuflation value measure supine position ; 30min , 45 min , 60min measurement 30 degree reverse trendelenburg position ( head bed elevate 30 degree ) . Intraabdominal hypertension define IAP 12 mmHg high , accord consensus definations World Society The Abdominal Compartment Syndrome . After end operation anesthetic agent stop 4 mg/kg sugammadex perform IV .
DOC.criteria: morbidly obese patient plan sleewe gastrectomy procedures general anestesia ASA 23 status 1860 year old Documented coronary periferally arteryel disease , unregulated diabetes mellitus , history smoking , symptom bowel urinary bladder obstruction , preoperative systolic pressure grater 170 mmHg , diastolic arterial pressure grater 90mmHg , pregnancy , anemia ( haematocrit level % 30 ) , symptom increase intracranial pressure , significant stenosis carotid artery .
